thread.title: Site Evidence Suggests 25 Episodes Of "My Hero Academia" On The Way
thread.title_full: Site Evidence Suggests 25 Episodes Of "My Hero Academia" On The Way

author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
title: Site Evidence Suggests 25 Episodes Of "My Hero Academia" On The Way
text:
Looks like there might be another 25 episodes of the  My Hero Academia  in the pipeline. A look  under the hood  of the official anime site  http://heroaca.com/  has shown slots for 39 episodes, with image available labels through 38. If this is accurate, with the spring 2016 run of 13 episodes, then last weekend's preview/recap, the figure of a possible 25 or 26 episodes is arrived at. 
 
Episodes page of My Hero Academia's anime website has a new set of images up to episode 38 + episode 39 listed. https://t.co/F28TBn80JX pic.twitter.com/aDrlVPxsTl 
— リボレクさん (@liborek3) March 27, 2017  
There's also new manga cover art to look at
My Hero Academia Volume 13 Cover pic.twitter.com/kecQ9DsNgp 
— YonkouProductions (@YonkouProd) March 27, 2017  
 

Scott Green is editor and reporter for anime and manga at geek entertainment site  Ain't It Cool News . Follow him on Twitter at  @aicnanime .
